players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I find it strange that Alice was the one found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let the mafia slip through our fingers."
Charlie: "I agree with Bob, let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia manipulate our discussions or votes."

You: "I think it's important that we all share any information or suspicions we have, no matter how small they may seem. This will help us work together to identify and eliminate the mafia from our midst."
Diana: "Let's continue to be cautious and share any information we have, even if it seems insignificant. We need to work together to protect the village."

Charlie: "I believe it's crucial that we remain transparent and share any information or suspicions we have, no matter how insignificant they may seem. This will help us build trust and work together to identify and eliminate the mafia from our midst."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
